title: Quadratic Formula Calculator – Step-by-Step Solver for ax² + bx + c = 0

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: x_{\text{vertex}} = -\frac{b}{2a}, \qquad y_{\text{vertex}} = f(x_{\text{vertex}}) = a x_{\text{vertex}}^2 + b x_{\text{vertex}} + c.
formulas.raw: x_{\text{vertex}} = -\frac{b}{2a}, \qquad y_{\text{vertex}} = f(x_{\text{vertex}}) = a x_{\text{vertex}}^2 + b x_{\text{vertex}} + c.

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: \\Delta = (' + formatNumber(b, decimals) + ')^2 - 4 \\cdot ' + formatNumber(a, decimals) + ' \\cdot ' + formatNumber(c, decimals) + ' = ' + formatNumber(delta, decimals) + ' \
formulas.raw: \\Delta = (' + formatNumber(b, decimals) + ')^2 - 4 \\cdot ' + formatNumber(a, decimals) + ' \\cdot ' + formatNumber(c, decimals) + ' = ' + formatNumber(delta, decimals) + ' \

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \[ x_{\text{vertex}} = -\frac{b}{2a}, \qquad y_{\text{vertex}} = f(x_{\text{vertex}}) = a x_{\text{vertex}}^2 + b x_{\text{vertex}} + c. \]
